description:
The Classic PJ Short is a comfortable and breathable sleepwear short that is designed for pure bliss, whether sleeping or lounging.

  • It is made of TENCEL™ Modal, a natural and eco-friendly fabric that is soft, cool, and moisture-wicking
  • The short has an 8-inch inseam and a semi-fitted design that follows the shape of your body but leaves some room for movement
  • It also has two hand pockets, ribbed cuffs, and a drawstring waistband for convenience and style
name: BN3TH Classic PJ Short - Men's
